languages.text: {n}Мехадендриты кольцами обвивают плечи и грудь техножреца, словно стремятся защитить.{/n} "Запрос одобрен. Я действительно скрыл некоторую информацию. Я был учеником {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната, однако совершил акт его предательства после того, как он отступился от священных догматов".

traits.locale_text: {n}Механодендриты кольцами обвивают плечи и грудь техножреца, словно стремятся защитить. Помедлив, Паскаль отвечает без всякого желания:{/n} "Запрос одобрен. Я действительно скрыл некоторую информацию. Я был учеником {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната, однако совершил акт его предательства после того, как он отступился от священных догматов".
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."
languages.original_text: {n}Мехадендриты кольцами обвивают плечи и грудь техножреца, словно стремятся защитить.{/n} "Запрос одобрен. Я действительно скрыл некоторую информацию. Я был учеником {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}архимагоса{/g} Амарната, однако совершил акт его предательства после того, как он отступился от священных догматов".

traits.locale_text: {n}The mechanodendrites coil around the tech-priest chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him. Pascal hesitates and replies with obvious lack of enthusiasm:{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

languages.text: {n}Las mecadendritas se enroscan en torno al pecho y los hombros del tecnosacerdote, como si intentasen protegerle.{/n} «Su solicitud ha sido aprobada. Es verdad que oculté cierta información. Fui alumno del {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat, pero cometí un acto de traición después de que se desviase de nuestro dogma sagrado».
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Las mecadendritas se enroscan en torno al pecho y los hombros del tecnosacerdote, como si intentasen protegerle.{/n} «Su solicitud ha sido aprobada. Es verdad que oculté cierta información. Fui alumno del {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat, pero cometí un acto de traición después de que se desviase de nuestro dogma sagrado».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}機械触手が技術司祭の胸と肩に絡みつき、まるで彼を守ろうとしているようだ。{/n}「要求を承認した。確かに私は特定の情報を秘匿にした。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトの生徒だったが、彼が神聖な教義から逸脱した後、私は裏切り行為を犯した」
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}機械触手が技術司祭の胸と肩に絡みつき、まるで彼を守ろうとしているようだ。{/n}「要求を承認した。確かに私は特定の情報を秘匿にした。私は{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大賢人{/g}アマルナトの生徒だったが、彼が神聖な教義から逸脱した後、私は裏切り行為を犯した」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须盘绕在他胸膛和肩膀上，似乎在试图保护他。{/n}“请求已核准。我确实隐瞒了一些信息。我曾是{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}阿玛纳特的学生，但在他偏离神圣教条后，我背叛了他。”
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡的机械触须盘绕在他胸膛和肩膀上，似乎在试图保护他。{/n}“请求已核准。我确实隐瞒了一些信息。我曾是{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}大贤者{/g}阿玛纳特的学生，但在他偏离神圣教条后，我背叛了他。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Les mécadendrites s'enroulent autour des épaules et de la poitrine du technoprêtre, comme pour le protéger.{/n} « Votre requête est approuvée. Il est vrai que j'ai dissimulé certaines informations. J'étais l'élève de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat, mais j'ai commis une trahison lorsqu'il s'est écarté du dogme sacré. »
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Les mécadendrites s'enroulent autour des épaules et de la poitrine du technoprêtre, comme pour le protéger.{/n} « Votre requête est approuvée. Il est vrai que j'ai dissimulé certaines informations. J'étais l'élève de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}archimagos{/g} Amarnat, mais j'ai commis une trahison lorsqu'il est écarté du dogme sacré. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Die Mechadendriten winden sich um die Brust und Schultern des Techpriesters, als würden sie versuchen, ihn zu beschützen.{/n} "Genehmigung erteilt. Ich habe gewisse Informationen verborgen. Ich war ein Schüler von {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat, doch ich habe einen Akt des Verrats begangen, nachdem er vom heiligen Dogma abgewichen war."
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Mechadendriten winden sich um die Brust und Schultern des Techpriesters, als würden sie versuchen, ihn zu beschützen.{/n} "Genehmigung erteilt. Ich habe gewisse Informationen verborgen. Ich war ein Schüler von {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Erzmagos{/g} Amarnat, doch ich habe einen Akt des Verrats begangen, nachdem er vom heiligen Dogma abgewichen war."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of Archmagos Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

languages.text: {n}Mekadentritler, koruma sağlarcasına Tekno Rahip'in göğsünü ve omuzlarını çevreliyor.{/n} "Talep onaylandı. Belirli bilgileri saklı tuttuğum doğrudur. {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın öğrencisiydim ancak kutsal dogmaya yüz çevirmesinin ardından ona ihanet ettim."
languages.original_text: {n}The mechadendrites coil around the Tech-Priest's chest and shoulders, as if trying to protect him.{/n} "The request is approved. I did conceal certain information. I was a student of {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Archmagos{/g} Amarnat, but I committed an act of betrayal after he deviated from sacred dogma."

traits.locale_text: {n}Mekadentritler Tekno Rahip'in göğsünü ve omuzlarını onu korurcasına çevreliyor.{/n} "Talep onaylandı. Belirli bilgileri saklı tuttuğum doğrudur. {g|Encyclopedia:Archmagos}Başmagos{/g} Amarnat'ın öğrencisiydim ancak kutsal dogmaya yüz çevirmesinin ardından ona ihanet ettim."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
